content.rendered:
Sichuan Airlines Co., Ltd.  is a regional airline headquartered on the grounds of Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport in Chengdu, Sichuan in China, operating mainly scheduled domestic flights out of Chengdu Shuangliu Airport and Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport. The airline was established on 1986.

 

 

Verified & Updated on: 15/07/21

Sichuan Airlines in Chengdu, Sichuan Contact Address, Phone, Email and Website

Sichuan Airlines Address : Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport, Chengdu, Sichuan

Phone number : +86-28-8888-8888(7x24h)
Email: e-bookingservice@sichuanair.com

Working Hours: Monday-Sunday 9:00-21:00 (GMT +8)

Sichuan Airlines Official website : www.global.sichuanair.com/

Sichuan Airlines Online Check-in: www.global.sichuanair.com/checkin

Note: Online check-in is available 2 hours prior to scheduled time of departure.

Check Sichuan Airlines schedule here: www.global.sichuanair.com/schedule

Check Sichuan Airlines flight status here: www.global.sichuanair.com/flight status

Fleet size: 173

  • Airbus A319-100
  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo
  • Airbus A321-200
  • Airbus A321neo
  • Airbus A330-200
  • Airbus A330-300
  • Airbus A350-900
  • Comac C919
  • Airbus A330-200F

Sichuan Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Sichuan Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Sichuan Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Golden Panda

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Sichuan Airlines office in Chengdu, Sichuan Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Sichuan Airlines office in Chengdu, Sichuan: (click on the stars below)
